effect.sword-shield: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.sword-shield: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user attacks with an energy-draining punch that restores the user’s HP.
